import React from "react" import "../../styles/control/ControlPanel.css" import FormColors from "./form/Colors.js" import Download from "./Download" import FormData from "./form/Data" import FormLayouts from "./form/Layouts" const ControlPanel = ({ data, onChangeColor, onSubmit, theme, content, submitDisabled, onChangeContent, onSelectedLayout, selectedLayout, }) => { return ( <>
selectedLayout={selectedLayout}
) } export default ControlPanel
